attributes.title: Worst decision of my life
attributes.review: Decided I wanted to support my president and downloaded the app. Worst decision I ever made. It smells bad. Like smells awful. Like there was a time where my entire school smelled like fish and this was worse. 0/10 absolutely do not recommend

attributes.title: Trash🤢
attributes.review: This app is total garbage!! It is constantly crashing and is terribly slow so I find no point in using it. Once you sign up it spams your email and sends many unwanted messages to you inbox.

attributes.title: bewildered
attributes.review: As soon as I got the app my house was suddenly engulfed in flames but not only that when I tried to exit out of the app to call the fire department the app called me a monkey looking black and told me to go outside and hold the lamp for them. DiSgUstiNg behavior that is controlled by THUGS.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: This is absurd, this app had used up all my data. If you’re wondering why you bill is so high, this app is responsible, my bills were significantly better after I deleted the app.

attributes.title: MAYBE IF HE STAN EXO🙈🤡
attributes.review:
I can't believe
기다렸던 이런 느낌 (oh)

I said don't mess up my tempo
그녀의 맘을 훔칠 beat uh
어디에도 없을 리듬에 맞춰 one, two, three uh
Don't mess up my tempo
멈출 수 없는 이끌림 oh
매혹적인 넌 lovely
틈 없이 좁혀진 거리
불규칙해지는 heartbeat
잠시 눈을 감아 trust me (woo hoo)
밖으로 나갈 채비 미리 해둬 are you ready? (look)

attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review: This might be the worst app I have ever downloaded I would not recommend like you should probably just be better off downloading Facebook or something I don’t know🧚🏼✨

attributes.title: Could cause harm to children
attributes.review: As a mother you need to look out for your children, there have been numerous study’s that have said this app could cause a disability to your child! I am so upset, I have caused harm to my unborn baby! Do not download this app.

attributes.title: Ugh
attributes.review: Literally the worst app. I love my trump so much but he needs better technicians! I was spammed so bad. Trump spends more time putting on his orange makeup than working on these problems😔I hope to see it fixed! Meanwhile I’ll leave some fairy comments on his insta.

attributes.title: disgraceful
attributes.review: i was so excited to get this app because i am a very loyal trump supporter (i go to every rally i can, and i spend all my money on his merchandise because i love the font they use). however, the service was poor, and i regret ever getting it. someone called me and said they were from this app and that they needed my credit card info, so i gave it to them. then, all my money was used as a “donation” to his campaign. bruh pay me back:(

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I kept getting text from the app saying that the government with come after me if I don’t support hippopotamus racist bad president in the whole US Trump . I’m traumatize from what happened to me😭😭😭. Don’t download it and don’t support him thank you☺️🧚✨
